text: A chicken sandwich is a type of food. It might have came from the southern United States. Some fast food restaurants sell chicken sandwiches, like Chick- fil-A and McDonald's. Toppings like pickles and a sauce mix can be added to the sandwich. == Ingredients == *Bread (Usually a bun) *Chicken (Usually deep fried) == Variation == In some Latin American countries, chicken can be added to a sandwich called pepito. == References == Category:Chicken as food Category:Hamburgers Category:American food
title: Chicken sandwich
